description_txt: stated on August 7, 2013 in an interview:
quote_txt: Under a new law regulating abortions, "Even if you're raped, if you don't report it in the first 30 days, the Republicans will force you to have an ultrasound."

description_txt: stated on August 5, 2013 in a campaign video:
quote_txt: Says he "sued Obama’s EPA seven times."

description_txt: stated on August 15, 2013 in blog posts:
quote_txt: Obamacare provision will allow "forced home inspections" by government agents.

description_txt: stated on August 4, 2013 in a 'USA Today' op-ed:
quote_txt: Says unions call Obamacare "bad for workers."

description_txt: stated on August 7, 2013 in a website posting:
quote_txt: "Only in Washington would politicians spend $27 million to teach Moroccans how to make pottery."

description_txt: stated on August 6, 2013 in a speech on homeownership:
quote_txt: "We now sell more products made in America to the rest of the world than ever before."

description_txt: stated on August 15, 2013 in a TV ad:
quote_txt: Marijuana is "less toxic" than alcohol.

description_txt: stated on August 12, 2013 in a radio commentary.:
quote_txt: "According to a recent Congressional Budget Office report, under Obamacare, 7 million people will lose their employer-sponsored insurance."

description_txt: stated on August 7, 2013 in a radio interview:
quote_txt: Atlanta now has as many visitors as Las Vegas, San Diego and Los Angeles. Orlando, Fla., and New York City still have more visitors.

description_txt: stated on August 2, 2013 in a floor speech.:
quote_txt: Under Obamacare, "The IRS will have access to the American people’s protected health care information."

description_txt: stated on July 29, 2013 in a campaign press statement:
quote_txt: Says that in his first two years, "Wisconsin has seen its best two-year job growth in a decade."

description_txt: stated on August 12, 2013 in an opinion column on NJ.com:
quote_txt: "Polls show that 96 percent of New Jerseyans – and 95 percent of gun households in the state – support expanding background checks to keep guns away from those who shouldn’t have them."

description_txt: stated on August 2, 2013 in a speech:
quote_txt: "Since the passage of the Affordable Care Act, U.S. health care spending grew at 3.9 percent for the last three years, the lowest growth rate in over 50 years."

description_txt: stated on August 12, 2013 in an interview on WPRO-AM:
quote_txt: Under Obamacare, members of Congress are required to purchase their health insurance from the new exchanges.
footer: By C. Eugene Emery Jr. • August 18, 2013

description_txt: stated on August 7, 2013 in an opinion article:
quote_txt: Says "nearly half of Oregon's children are poor."

description_txt: stated on July 2, 2013 in a Twitter post:
quote_txt: "60 percent of Texas 8th graders are not proficient in math. Only 26% have a teacher with a undergraduate major in math."

description_txt: stated on August 9, 2013 in an email to Obama supporters in Florida:
quote_txt: Sen. Marco Rubio "refuses to accept the basic science" on climate change and is "a climate change denier."

description_txt: stated on August 12, 2013 in an interview on Comedy Central's "The Daily Show":
quote_txt: Many uninsured Americans are "young."

description_txt: stated on August 8, 2013 in an opinion column.:
quote_txt: According to the U.S. Census Bureau, 71.2 percent of Hispanic registered voters in Texas and over 86 percent of African American registered voters participated in the 2012 elections.

description_txt: stated on August 12, 2013 in a speech:
quote_txt: Medicaid spending declined by 1.9 percent in 2012, the second such decline in 47 years.

description_txt: stated on July 15, 2013 in an opinion article:
quote_txt: Says that each year, about 25,000 American women become pregnant through rape or incest.

description_txt: stated on August 12, 2013 in an interview on Comedy Central's "The Daily Show":
quote_txt: "Why didn't (uninsured Americans) buy insurance? Because of the expense."

description_txt: stated on August 12, 2013 in an interview on Comedy Central's "The Daily Show":
quote_txt: Of the roughly 15 percent of Americans who don’t have health insurance, "half of them made more than $50,000 a year."

description_txt: stated on June 11, 2013 in a newspaper interview:
quote_txt: I have the most Grammys of anyone my age, but I haven't won one against a white person.

description_txt: stated on August 10, 2013 in a speech to the Family Leadership Summit in Ames, Iowa:
quote_txt: Says "President Obama just granted all of Congress an exception" to Obamacare.

description_txt: stated on August 14, 2013 in a mayoral forum:
quote_txt: "Sixty percent of the auto thefts that we have in (St. Petersburg) are caused by people leaving their keys in the car."

description_txt: stated on August 6, 2013 in a campaign ad:
quote_txt: Says Mitch McConnell pushed "the Wall Street bailout through the U.S. Senate" and called it "the Senate at its finest."

description_txt: stated on August 5, 2013 in a campaign ad:
quote_txt: Says Matt Bevin has repeatedly failed to pay his taxes.

description_txt: stated on July 29, 2013 in a speech:
quote_txt: Says President Franklin Delano Roosevelt "felt there wasn’t a need in the public sector to have collective bargaining because the government is the people."

description_txt: stated on August 6, 2013 in a mayoral forum:
quote_txt: "For anybody who's trying to cross the street and has seen those signs that say you have to stop when pedestrians are in the crosswalk, that was a bill that I passed."
